text: Micreremidae is a family of oribatids in the order Oribatida. There are at least 4 genera and about 14 described species in Micreremidae. ==Genera== * Fenichelia Balogh, 1970 * Mexiceremus J. & P. Balogh, 1998 * Micreremus Berlese, 1908 * Phylloribatula Balogh & Mahunka, 1978 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Acariformes
title: Micreremidae
